p: The hydrothermal method is a well-known process for preparation of metal oxides with different morphologies, but unfortunately, this method destroys the surface area of carbon which is an important parameter for efficient supercapacitor. M.M. EL-Deeb et al. prepared carbon xerogel doped with NiCo 2O 4 for methanol electro-oxidation, he found that the surface area S BET of carbon xerogel after the hydrothermal process drops from 701.9 to 64.0 m 2 g âˆ’1 [ 30].
